19 struct NavigateToEndPoint
20  : SmaccState<NavigateToEndPoint, RadialMotionStateMachine,
21  mpl::list<NavigationOrthogonalLine,ToolOrthogonalLine>> // <- these are the orthogonal lines of this State
22 {
23  // when this state is finished move to the ReturnToRadialStart state
24  typedef sc::transition<EvActionResult<smacc::SmaccMoveBaseActionClient::Result>, ReturnToRadialStart::ReturnToRadialStart> reactions;
25 
26 public:
27  using SmaccState::SmaccState;
28 
29  void onEntry()
30  {
31  ROS_INFO("-------");
32  ROS_INFO("Initializating Navigate to endpoint state");
33  }
34 
35  void onExit()
36  {
37  }
38 };

44  Navigate> {
45 public:
46  using SmaccState::SmaccState;
47 
48  void onEntry()
49  {
50  }
51 };
52 //------------------------------------------------------------------
53 // this is the navigate substate inside the navigation orthogonal line of the RotateDegreess State
54 struct Navigate : SmaccState<Navigate, NavigationOrthogonalLine>
55 {
56 public:
57  // the angle of the current radial motion
58  double yaw;
59 
60  // distance parameter of the motion
61  double dist;
62 
63  using SmaccState::SmaccState;
64 
65  void onEntry()
66  {
67  ROS_INFO("Entering Navigate");
68 
69  // this substate will need access to the "MoveBase" resource or plugin. In this line
70  // you get the reference to this resource.
71  this->requiresComponent(moveBaseClient_ ,ros::NodeHandle("move_base"));
72  this->requiresComponent(odomTracker_);
73  this->requiresComponent(plannerSwitcher_ , ros::NodeHandle("move_base"));
74 
75  // read from the state machine yaw "global variable"
76  this->getGlobalSMData("current_yaw", yaw);
77  ROS_INFO_STREAM("[NavigateToEndPoint/Navigate] current yaw: " << yaw);
78 
79  // straight motion distance
80  this->param("straight_motion_distance", dist, 3.5);
81  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Straight motion distance: " << dist);
82 
83  goToEndPoint();
84  }
85 
86  // auxiliar function that defines the motion that is requested to the move_base action server
87  void goToEndPoint() {
88  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped radialStartPose;
89  this->getGlobalSMData("radial_start_pose", radialStartPose);
90 
91  smacc::SmaccMoveBaseActionClient::Goal goal;
92  goal.target_pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
93 
94  // in order to find the goal we create a virtual line from the origin to
95  // some yaw direction and some distance
96  goal.target_pose = radialStartPose;
97  goal.target_pose.pose.position.x += cos(yaw) * dist;
98  goal.target_pose.pose.position.y += sin(yaw) * dist;
99  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation =
100  tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(0, 0, yaw);
101 
102  moveBaseClient_->sendGoal(goal);
103 
104  this->odomTracker_->clearPath();
105  ROS_WARN_STREAM("SETTING STARTING POINT" << radialStartPose);
106  this->odomTracker_->setStartPoint(radialStartPose);
107  }
108 
109  void onExit()
110  {
111  ROS_INFO("Exiting move goal Action Client");
112  }
113 
114 private:
115  // keeps the reference to the move_base resorce or plugin (to connect to the move_base action server).
116  // this resource can be used from any method in this state
117  smacc::SmaccMoveBaseActionClient *moveBaseClient_;
118 
119  smacc_odom_tracker::OdomTracker* odomTracker_;
120 
121  smacc_planner_switcher::PlannerSwitcher* plannerSwitcher_;
122 };
123

137  {
138  ROS_INFO("Finishing the tool orthogonal line");

140 };
141 
142 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
143 struct ToolSubstate
144  : SmaccState<ToolSubstate, ToolOrthogonalLine>
145 {
146 public:
147 
148  using SmaccState::SmaccState;
149 
150  void onEntry()
151  {
152  ROS_INFO("Entering ToolSubstate");
153 
154  this->requiresComponent(toolActionClient_ ,ros::NodeHandle("tool_action_server"));
155 
156  smacc::SmaccToolActionClient::Goal goal;
157  goal.command = smacc::SmaccToolActionClient::Goal::CMD_START;
158  toolActionClient_->sendGoal(goal);
159  }
160 
161  smacc::SmaccToolActionClient* toolActionClient_;
162 };
